description: This notification is generated when a primary-to-backup PW switching
happens. The first three elements show the primary PW
and the second three elements show the backup PW.

event.Summary: PW switched from primary to backup

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnPwSwitchPtoB HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPwID u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPwID u 9999

description: A unique index for a PW.
variables.name: HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex

description: A unique index for a PW.
variables.name: HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex

description: This notification is generated when a backup-to-primary PW switching
happens. The first three elements show the backup PW
and the second three elements show the primary PW.

event.Summary: PW switched from backup to primary

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnPwSwitchBtoP HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPwID u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex u 9999 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPeerIp a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwPwID u 9999

description: A unique index for a PW.
variables.name: HH3C-L2VPN-MIB::hh3cL2vpnXcgPwIndex

description: A unique index for a PW.
